name: Cube Life: Island Survival
overview: Cube Life: Island Survival is the first block building open-world survival game for the Nintendo Wii U. In Creative Mode, the game will allow players to build constructions in 3D generated game worlds. In Survival Mode, the player must maintain health, explore caves, gather resources, and craft tools on an unknown island. Get food, explore and build during the day. Hide, fight, and surive as night falls on the island.
